医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
赛洛西宾有助于减少临床医生在 COVID-19 危机中的抑郁症裸盖菇素辅助心理治疗使 2020 年和 2021 年提供一线 COVID-19 护理的临床医生的抑郁症显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Psilocybin-helps-reduce-depression-in-clinicians-amid-COVID-19-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Psilocybin-helps-reduce-depression-in-clinicians-amid-COVID-19-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82134f18-14f8-4df6-b1df-75bcc7df01a8 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 21:55:42 -0500 Psilocybin helps reduce depression in clinicians amid COVID-19 crisis
癌症预防和筛查避免的死亡多于治疗进步美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 研究人员领导的一项模型研究显示，在过去 45 年里，癌症预防和筛查方面的改进所避免的五种癌症死亡人数加起来比治疗方法的进步还要多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Cancer-prevention-and-screening-avert-more-deaths-than-treatment-advances.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Cancer-prevention-and-screening-avert-more-deaths-than-treatment-advances.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4327368-a71b-4623-a4a1-de1ad2f531bd Thu, 05 Dec 2024 21:51:41 -0500 Cancer prevention and screening avert more deaths than treatment advances
心理压力和疼痛会导致寻求庇护者罹患心血管疾病威尔康奈尔医学研究人员表示，许多在美国寻求庇护的人表现出与心血管疾病迹象相关的压力和疼痛症状增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Psychological-stress-and-pain-contribute-to-cardioangio-disease-in-asylum-seekers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Psychological-stress-and-pain-contribute-to-cardioangio-disease-in-asylum-seekers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fccc1b1-dba1-42b0-9b78-272c5ea2e371 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 21:44:21 -0500 Psychological stress and pain contribute to cardiovascular disease in asylum seekers
EZH2抑制剂增强癌症免疫疗法的有效性根据威尔康奈尔医学淋巴瘤研究人员领导的一项临床前研究，一类名为 EZH2 抑制剂的新兴抗癌药物可能会大大增强某些癌症免疫疗法的效力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/EZH2-inhibitors-enhance-efficiency-of-cancer-immunotherapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/EZH2-inhibitors-enhance-efficiency-of-cancer-immunotherapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40feb0cc-50c2-42df-bd76-d259f34f9fc7 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 21:35:56 -0500 EZH2 inhibitors enhance effectiveness of cancer immunotherapies
新的风险评分可准确预测女性心血管事件新的风险评分可以准确预测和分类女性发生心脏病等主要不良心血管事件的风险。研究结果今天发表在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 期刊《放射学：心胸影像》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/New-risk-score-accurately-predicts-cardioangio-events-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/New-risk-score-accurately-predicts-cardioangio-events-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54f8d73e-f1ad-4f20-a069-07c0e82c01c6 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 20:20:12 -0500 New risk score accurately predicts cardiovascular events in women
生物工程师开发植入式传感器来实时监测炎症蛋白质是生命的基石，蛋白质水平的变化可以表明健康状况改善或即将患病，包括炎症迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Bioengineers-develop-implantable-sensors-to-monitor-inflammation-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Bioengineers-develop-implantable-sensors-to-monitor-inflammation-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68c06fab-eab3-4a5e-a950-bbd0fce44da2 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 20:14:01 -0500 Bioengineers develop implantable sensors to monitor inflammation in real time
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：丰富多彩的演员阵容可以领导主要的卫生机构当选总统唐纳德·特朗普继续任命一些创新的人选来领导主要的联邦卫生机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/KFF-Health-News-Whatt-Health-A-colorful-cast-could-lead-key-health-agcies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/KFF-Health-News-Whatt-Health-A-colorful-cast-could-lead-key-health-agcies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccea55aa-df78-442b-b058-7253e94b8eb0 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 20:04:00 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': A colorful cast could lead key health agencies
激活蛋白质信号通路可减缓前列腺癌的生长一种特殊的蛋白质可以在对抗某些类型的前列腺癌中发挥关键作用。瑞典于默奥大学领导的一个国际研究小组的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Activating-a- Protein-signaling-pathway-slows-prostate-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Activating-a- Protein-signaling-pathway-slows-prostate-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bbde6dd-a0bd-486d-8da2-143575d9cc6b Thu, 05 Dec 2024 19:58:00 -0500 Activating a protein signaling pathway slows prostate cancer growth
早期卵巢切除和 APOE4 会增加女性患阿尔茨海默病的风险多伦多大学的一组研究人员与阿尔伯塔大学的同事合作发表的新研究发现，在 50 岁之前接受过双侧卵巢手术且携带载脂蛋白基因变体（APOE4 等位基因）的女性，是晚年患阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的高风险人群。使用激素疗法可以减轻这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Early-ovarian-removal-and-APOE4-increase-Alzheimers-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Early-ovarian-removal-and-APOE4-increase-Alzheimers-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94eb4be9-8be7-4f54-a1d0-9a1e02dc9101 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 19:52:49 -0500 Early ovarian removal and APOE4 increase Alzheimer's risk in women
森林砍伐破坏了疟疾预防工作当森林因发展而丧失时，一些影响是显而易见的。一年后，地上到处是树桩和泥坑、犁过的田地或房屋。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Deforestation-undermines-malaria-prevention-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Deforestation-undermines-malaria-prevention-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22a92bb6-aa60-4e15-8cff-9c3989f78e15 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 19:34:55 -0500 Deforestation undermines malaria prevention efforts
